content: Administrator Message Settings is a way to contact the portal administrator.

comment.text: The AdminsMessageMobileDescription translation key provides a short description of the "Admin Message Settings" category in a mobile view, used to display a brief explanation when accessing this setting through a mobile device.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'إعدادات رسالة المسئول هي طريقة للتواصل مع مسئول البوابة' is not a perfect translation of 'Administrator Message Settings is a way to contact the portal administrator.'. 'مسئول' (mas'ool) translates to 'responsible person' or 'official', not necessarily 'administrator'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: إعدادات رسائل المسؤول هي طريقة للتواصل مع مدير البوابة. (I'daadaat rasaa'il al-mas'ool hiya tareeqah lil-tawaasul ma'a mudeer al-bawaa'h)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Admin Mesaj Parametrləri' is a somewhat literal and not entirely natural way to say 'Administrator Message Settings'. A more fluent translation would be something like 'İdarəetmə mesajları parametrləri' or 'Administrator mesajları ayarları'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İdarəetmə mesajları parametrləri or Administrator mesajları ayarları

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'əlaqə qurmağın bir yoludur' is a bit wordy. A more direct and natural translation of 'a way to contact' would be 'əlaqə saxlamaq' or 'əlaqə yaratmaq'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: əlaqə saxlamaq or əlaqə yaratmaq

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Über die Einstellungen für Administratormeldungen können Sie den Portaladministrator kontaktieren' is a bit clunky and not a direct equivalent of 'Administrator Message Settings is a way to contact the portal administrator.' It's accurate but could be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation might be: 'Mit den Administratormeldungseinstellungen können Sie den Portaladministrator erreichen.' or 'Über die Administratormeldungen können Sie den Portaladministrator kontaktieren.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Οι Ρυθμίσεις μηνυμάτων διαχειριστή' is too literal. A more natural translation would be 'Settings for administrator messages' or 'Administrator message settings'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ρυθμίσεις για μηνύματα διαχειριστή

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'πύλης' (portal) is acceptable but slightly formal. Considering the context, a more conversational term might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εφαρμογής

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'is a way to contact' is somewhat clumsy. A more direct and fluent translation could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: είναι ένας τρόπος για να επικοινωνήσετε με

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'La configuración del mensaje del administrador es una forma de ponerse en contacto con el administrador del portal' is overly literal and slightly awkward. 'Configuración del mensaje del administrador' is quite long and not the most natural phrasing. A more fluent translation would convey the same meaning more concisely.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Las opciones de mensaje del administrador permiten contactar con el administrador del portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Järjestelmänvalvojan Viestiasetukset on helppo tapa ottaa yhteyttä järjestelmänvalvojaan" is a bit verbose and includes "on helppo tapa" (is an easy way). The English is more direct: 'Administrator Message Settings is a way to contact the portal administrator.' A more accurate translation would be closer to simply stating it's a way to contact the administrator.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Järjestelmänvalvojan viestiasetukset on tapa ottaa yhteyttä järjestelmänvalvojaan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ադմինիստրատորի հաղորդագրությունների կարգավորումները պորտալի ադմինիստրատորի հետ կապ հաստատելու միջոց է:' is a bit literal and awkward. It translates to 'Administrator's message settings is a way to establish contact with the portal administrator.' A more natural phrasing would be something like 'This setting allows you to contact the portal administrator' or 'This allows you to send messages to the portal administrator'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'Սա թույլատրում է կապվել պորտալի ադմինիստրատորին' (This allows you to contact the portal administrator) or 'Պորտալի ադմինիստրատորին հաղորդագրություն հասցնելու համար օգտագործեք այս գործունեությունը' (Use this function to send a message to the portal administrator).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'ադմինիստրատոր' is repeated several times, which can sound repetitive in Armenian. While technically correct, it might be more fluid to vary the phrasing slightly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using variations or pronouns to avoid repetition. For example, 'Ադմինիստրատորի հետ կապ հաստատելու համար...' (To contact the administrator...)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Le impostazioni dei messaggi dell'amministratore rappresentano un modo per contattare l'amministratore del portale" is a bit literal and slightly awkward in Italian. 'Rappresentano un modo' is not the most natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Le impostazioni dei messaggi dell'amministratore consentono di contattare l'amministratore del portale.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Administrator Message Settings' is not accurate. 'ຜູ້ເບິ່ງແຍງລະບົບ' translates to 'system administrator', but it doesn't convey the 'Message Settings' part. It misses the nuance of settings related to messages.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more descriptive translation like: 'ການຕັ້ງຄ່າຂໍ້ຄວາມຈາກຜູ້ເບິ່ງແຍງລະບົບ' (Message settings from the system administrator) or 'ການຕັ້ງຄ່າການສົ່ງຂໍ້ຄວາມຂອງຜູ້ເບິ່ງແຍງລະບົບ' (Message sending settings from the system administrator).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ປະຕູ' (door) is added at the end of the translation, which is not present in the English content and doesn't make sense in this context. It's likely a translation error or misunderstanding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'ປະຕູ' from the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Beheerder Bericht Instellingen' is not a natural or idiomatic way to say 'Administrator Message Settings'.  'Bericht' translates to 'message', which is redundant as 'Administrator Message' already implies a message. It's also a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Beheerder Berichtinstellingen (combining 'bericht' and 'instellingen') or Beheerder Berichtconfiguratie (Administrator Message Configuration) would be more accurate and natural. A simpler option, depending on context, would be Beheerder Bericht (Administrator Message).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure 'Beheerder Berichtinstellingen is een manier...' is somewhat less elegant than other options.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'Beheerder Berichtinstellingen bieden een manier...' (Administrator Message Settings provide a way...).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Configurações de mensagem do administrador é uma forma de entrar em contato com o administrador do portal' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'As configurações de mensagens do administrador permitem entrar em contato com o administrador do portal.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: As configurações de mensagens do administrador permitem entrar em contato com o administrador do portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Configurações de mensagem do administrador é uma forma de entrar em contato com o administrador do portal' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Portuguese.  'Settings' doesn't directly translate to 'Configurações de mensagem'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like 'Configurações de Mensagem do Administrador permite entrar em contato com o administrador do portal' or 'Mensagem para o Administrador permite entrar em contato com o administrador do portal'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Setări mesagerie de administrator' is slightly awkward. While technically correct, a more natural Romanian phrasing would be preferred. 'Setări pentru mesajele administratorului' or 'Setări de contactare a administratorului' would be better alternatives.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Setări pentru mesajele administratorului

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිපාලක' is spelled incorrectly. The correct spelling is 'පරිශාලක'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශාලක

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'පරිපාලක පණිවුඩ සැකසුම්' is a slightly awkward translation of 'Administrator Message Settings'. A more natural phrasing would convey the purpose better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශාලක පණිවිඩම් සැකසුම්

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'ආසන්න අන්දමට' (approximate manner) can be removed for clarity. It's implied by the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශාලක පණිවිඩම් සැකසුම් යනු portal පරිපාලකයෙකු සම්බන්ධ කර ගැනීමට ඇති ක්‍රමයක් වේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Nastavenia sprav administrátorovi je spôsob ako kontaktovať administrátora portálu' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'Administrator Message Settings is a way to contact the portal administrator.' The phrasing 'Nastavenia sprav administrátorovi' is awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would be something like 'Nastavenie správ pre administrátora je spôsob, ako kontaktovať administrátora portálu.' or 'Možnosť poslať správu administrátorovi je spôsob, ako sa s ním kontaktovať.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Nastavenia sprav administrátorovi' contains a grammatical error. It's unclear what 'sprav' refers to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'sprav' with a more appropriate word to clarify the meaning. Perhaps 'správ' (messages) or 'oznámení' (notifications).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Подешавања порука администратора' is a literal translation of 'Administrator Message Settings' but doesn't fully convey the meaning in natural Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Поставке порука администратора' or 'Напомене администратора'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Поставке порука администратора

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'је начин да контактирате администратора портала' could be more concise. While not strictly incorrect, it is a bit verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: за контакт са администратором портала.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Podešavanja poruka administratora je način da kontaktirate administratora portala' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would convey the purpose more clearly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Podešavanja poruka administratora omogućavaju kontakt sa administratorom portala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "您可通过“管理员留言设置”联系门户管理员" is technically correct but slightly awkward and not as natural as it could be. 'Administrator Message Settings' isn't directly translated to the most common phrasing in Chinese for this function.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您可以通过“管理员留言设置”功能联系门户管理员
